DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize decrease estrogen level cause serum DKK1 peak , decrease gradually estrogens reach new low , steady level . The investigator also believe peak DKK1 initiate wave stem cell diversion osteoblastogenic pathway adipogenic pathway . The investigator conduct longitudinal cohort study post menopausal woman hormone-responsive breast cancer treat AIs . The study observe anthromorphic serum marker change first year treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Systemic Dickkopf-related Protein 1 ( DKK1 ) During Estrogen Level Changes Post-menopausal Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Aromatase Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Post Menopausal Breast cancer patient plan treatment aromatase inhibitor . 18 year old BMI > 30 < 18 Osteoporosis define protocol . Subjects currently bisphosphonate therapy . History primary secondary hyperparathyroidism History Hypoor Hyperthyroidism History Vitamin D level LLN History creatinine clearance EGFR History ofLiver function test 1.5 time ULN include LDH , SGOT , SGPT , Alkaline phosphatase , Bilirubin History document cirrhosis liver History chronic heparin use History chronic glucocorticoid therapy
